header.title: SVG/XML Serializer
header.abstract: This document describes the svg/xml serializer of Cocoon.

s1.title: SVG/XML Serializer
s1.p: The SVG serializer serializes sax events to SVG XML. The output of the SVG serializer is SVG XML; the SVG XML is not rasterized to any image format by this serializer.

s2.title: Sitemap Configuration
s2.p: The SVG XML serializer is declared in the sitemap serializers section.
s2.source: <map:serializers ... ... <map:serializer name="xml" src="org.apache.cocoon.serialization.XMLSerializer" mime-type="text/xml" doctype-public="-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.0//EN" doctype-system="http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-SVG-20010904/DTD/svg10.dtd"; logger="sitemap.serializer.xml" pool-max="32"> <!-- serializer configurations --> ... </map:serializer> ...
s2.p: The declaration of the SVG serializer shall use following XML serializer configuration parameters

tr.td: specifies the SVG XML public document type
specifies the SVG XML system document type
Following mime-type may be used, too: image/svg+xml, application/xml. The mime-type text/xml is the most general one.
